reference.title: cxxUnionAPIItemLocation
reference.shortdesc: Contains child elements specifying the location of the union.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxUnionAPIItemLocation> element is defined within <cxxUnionDefinition. The <cxxUnionAPIItemLocation> element must contain the location of the API declaration using <cxxUnionDeclarationFile> and <cxxUnionDeclarationFileLine>.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxUnionAPIItemLocation> <cxxUnionDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="D:/src/include/headerfile.h"/> <cxxUnionDeclarationFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="765"/> <cxxUnionDeclarationFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="787"/> </cxxUnionAPIItemLocation>
